title: Master Generative AI with UNIQ Technologies
subtitle: Master Generative AI with UNIQ Technologies and build AI-powered applications using Large Language Models (LLMs), Prompt Engineering, Vector Databases, LangChain, OpenAI APIs, and AI Automation tools. Designed for students, freshers, working professionals, and career-switchers, this course prepares you for real-world AI development with hands-on projects and industry mentorship.

afterCompleted.description: Generative AI is the fastest-growing tech skill globally. After completing our Generative AI Developer Course, you can apply for the following roles:

faq.question: What is the Generative AI course?
faq.answer: The Generative AI course trains you to build intelligent applications using LLMs, Prompt Engineering, LangChain, Vector Databases, and AI Automation tools. You will work on real-time AI projects and build deployable applications.

faq.question: Who can join this course?
faq.answer: Anyone interested in AI can join — Engineering/Arts students, working professionals, freshers, non-programmers, and career switchers. No prior coding experience is required.

faq.question: What are the job opportunities after this course?
faq.answer: You can apply for roles like Generative AI Engineer, Prompt Engineer, AI Developer, LLM Engineer, and Automation Specialist. Companies across the world are hiring for these roles.

faq.question: What tools and technologies will I learn?
faq.answer: You will learn OpenAI APIs, LangChain, Python, Vector Databases (FAISS/Chroma), AI Agents, Hugging Face, and deployment tools like Streamlit, FastAPI, and cloud platforms.

faq.question: How long is the course?
faq.answer: Typically 2–4 months depending on weekday/weekend options. Every module includes assignments and project work.

faq.question: Does UNIQ Technologies provide placement support?
faq.answer: Yes! You get 100% placement assistance, resume building, mock interviews, and daily interview opportunities.

faq.question: Can I rejoin classes if I miss topics?
faq.answer: Yes — unlimited repeat classes at no extra cost. You can rejoin anytime to revise topics.

faq.question: Is this course available online?
faq.answer: Yes, both online and offline training modes are available with live instructor-led sessions.

faq.question: Can I switch between online and offline modes?
faq.answer: Yes, you can switch anytime without extra charges.

faq.question: Is Generative AI in demand in 2025 and beyond?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Generative AI is one of the fastest-growing fields with massive job openings across industries.

faq.question: Will I receive a certificate?
faq.answer: Yes. You will receive a Course Completion & Internship Certificate recognized by top companies.

faq.question: What makes UNIQ Technologies unique?
faq.answer: Hands-on project training, top mentors, job-oriented curriculum, lifetime learning access, and daily placement opportunities.

faq.question: How can I enroll?
faq.answer: You can register via our website or visit our centers in Chennai or Bangalore. Our counselors will guide you through the batch options.
